task_prompt: 将吉林大学人工智能学院的第一段简介复制到已经打开的文本文档里
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "将吉林大学人工智能学院的第一段简介复制到已经打开的文本文档里"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 复制第一段

    2. 打开文本文档

    3. 将复制的文本粘贴到文本文档里


现在的子任务是 "将复制的文本粘贴到文本文档里"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Super_L"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_text":"notepad"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "将复制的文本粘贴到文本文档里"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response:
Based on the provided screenshot, to paste the copied text into the text document using Mousepad on a Linux system, you should focus on the Mousepad application and then use the 'Ctrl+V' keyboard shortcut to paste the text. Here is the sequence of actions you can take in JSON format:

```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":400,"height":300}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+V"}
]
```

In the above sequence:
- The "click" action with the position at width: 400 and height: 300 is aimed at bringing the Mousepad application into focus, assuming that the document is approximately in the center of the screen.
- The "Ctrl+V" keyboard action is to paste the copied text into the document.
LLM_response_editer:
我们需要将复制的文本粘贴到打开的文本文档里，我的动作是:

```json
[
   {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+V"}
]
```

In the above sequence:
- The "click" action with the position at width: 400 and height: 300 is aimed at bringing the Mousepad application into focus, assuming that the document is approximately in the center of the screen.
- The "Ctrl+V" keyboard action is to paste the copied text into the document.
task_prompt_en: Copy the first introduction of the Artificial Intelligence College of Jilin University to the opened text document
task_prompt_zh: 将吉林大学人工智能学院的第一段简介复制到已经打开的文本文档里
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and complete the specified task.
Your current goal is to operate the computer screen. The video width is 1024 and the video height is 768. The overall goal is to "copy the first introduction of the Artificial Intelligence College of Jilin University into the opened text document".
We have formulated an implementation plan for this overall goal:
1. Copy the first paragraph
2. Open the text document
3. Paste the copied text into the text document
The current subtask is "Paste the copied text into the text document".
You can use the mouse and keyboard. The operations you can select are:```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```The position of the mouse is the coordinate relative to the upper left corner of the screen. For keyboard keys, see [keysymdef. h].
Please output the execution action. Please output your action in json format, for example:
My plan is to click the Start button at the bottom left corner, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```Another example, my plan is to open notepad. I see Mousepad on the screen, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```The current subtask is "Paste the copied text into the text document". Please give detailed next steps according to the status of the existing screen image.

LLM_response_editer_en:
We need to paste the copied text into the open text document. My action is:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Control_L+v"}
]
```

In the above sequence:
- The "click" action with the position at width: 400 and height: 300 is aimed at bringing the Mousepad application into focus, assuming that the document is approximately in the center of the screen.
- The "Ctrl+V" keyboard action is to paste the copied text into the document.
LLM_response_editer_zh:
我们需要将复制的文本粘贴到打开的文本文档里，我的动作是:

```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Control_L+v"}
]
```按上述顺序：
-位置为width:400和height:300的“单击”操作旨在聚焦Mousepad应用程序，假设文档大约位于屏幕的中心。
-“Ctrl+V”键盘操作是将复制的文本粘贴到文档中。
